attr.title: Pillars of Dust
attr.desc: n this retro-style RPG, Prince Carlton and pauper Gregg must make their separate ways through a mysterious land to learn their origins - and find some nuggets along the way.
attr.inst: Buy and download the game from Steam and copy all game files into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Buy and download the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1144140/Pillars_of_Dust/) and copy all game files into the `assets` folder.
